obj.name: Cupboard
obj.action_dia: You rummage through the cupboard, brushing away expired medicine and bottles of unidentified substances. You find a {Yellow}screwdriver{end} at the back of the cupboard.
obj.used_dialogue: You rummage through the cupboard again, but find nothing

obj.name: Strange Panel
obj.action_dia: The panel lights up as you approach it, a friendly blue button lighting up on it's surface. You press it, and out of a slot on the panel's side a {Yellow}blue keycard{end} slides out. You pocket it.
obj.used_dialogue: You try and interact with the panel further, but the display seemed to have powered off completely, and didn't respond to your touch.

obj.name: Magic Portal
obj.action_dia: you move through the magic portal
obj.item_dia: you try and go through, but it doesnt exist yet

obj.name: {Cyan}Drinks machine{end}
obj.action_dia: You poke at the drinks dispenser, and a can of unidentified blue soda falls from it. You try and drink the stuff, it tastes dreadful. You throw away the can.

obj.name: Broken service robot
obj.action_dia: The robot's eyes power up, one of them dimmer than the other, and in a shaky synthetic voice it says: '{Green}helLo, h0w may i b{#^~^ of service? #beep#{end}'. You wave at it, and try to talk. Before you can, the thing reaches out it's arm and a huge pulse of energy goes into your body. When you open your eyes, you see that you are no longer in the staff room.

obj.name: {Green}Help {DarkRed}Bot!{end}
obj.action: say:Hello! The ship is currently on crash course with planet 11-BI, otherwise known as 'TBG', or 'Terre Bande Grandiose', it is reccommended you evacuuate the ship.
obj.action_dia: You blink at the droid in surprise, and try and ask it a question. The computer stays silent, then bursts out:

obj.name: {Cyan}Clean Camille{DarkGray}(tm){end}
obj.action_dia: The mechanical droid unfurls and delivers a crowbar into your hands. You barely have the time to be shocked, as the very next moment it explodes, briefly clouding your vision with smoke.
obj.used_dialogue: The mechanical droid... doesn't appear to exist anymore.

obj.name: Table
obj.action_dia: The table imparts it's wisdom upon you, saying:
obj.used_dialogue: The table has grown silent, no more wise words will come from it again.
